attributes.action: Stop Student Loan repayments due to COVID-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The repayment money can be used on bills, rents and other vital causes during this difficult time, so we hope the government can stop the student loan repayments for at least one year.
attributes.background: Many of former students who work full time now have to repay their Student Loan. However  due to the pandemic and financial pressures, many find it challenging to repay every month.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308579
